Consumable.Name: Elixir of Strength
Consumable.Description: An ancient potion known to bolster a knight's might. Its use grants a temporary boost to strength.
Consumable.UniqueProperties: Can be used once per battle
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: This potion is said to have been used by the legendary knight, Lancelot.

Consumable.Name: Chalice of Healing
Consumable.Description: A sacred chalice believed to possess the power of revitalization. When consumed, it restores a knight's health.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: King Arthur was said to have given it to his knights before embarking on perilous quests.

Consumable.Name: Ruby of Resilience
Consumable.Description: This mystical ruby hardens a knight's spirit when held, elevating their defensive traits.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: This ruby was an emblem of the Round Table's unyielding spirit.
